sn20.2:1.2: Atha kho bhagava parittam nakhasikhayam pamsum aropetva bhikkhu amantesi:
sn20.2:1.4: katamam nu kho bahutaram, yo cayam maya paritto nakhasikhayam pamsu aropito ya cayam mahapathavi”ti?
sn20.2:1.6: Appamattakoyam bhagavata paritto nakhasikhayam pamsu aropito.
sn20.2:1.7: Sankhampi na upeti upanidhimpi na upeti kalabhagampi na upeti mahapathavim upanidhaya bhagavata paritto nakhasikhayam pamsu aropito”ti.
sn20.2:1.8: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appaka te satta ye manussesu paccajayanti;
sn20.2:1.9: atha kho eteyeva bahutara satta ye annatra manussehi paccajayanti.
